name: GraviSound
description: Unusual continuation of the Button Music series - GraviSound ! Customize the way for the ball to create your own unique track!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Support for all modern processors Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Support for all modern video cards Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: For all sound cards
